title: Emmerdale fans are convinced axed Ellis gets 'killed off' in sepsis storyline after rusty nail wound

Quick-witted Emmerdale viewers were confident they know how Ellis Chapman will be killed off.

It was confirmed last month Emmerdale actor Asan N'Jie, who plays Chapman, would be axed from the ITV soap following his altercation with Jamie Lomas at the TV Choice Awards.

During Tuesday's episode of Emmerdale, viewers watched Ellis have a typical bad day as he suffered a deep cut on his arm from a thick, rusty nail as he attempted manual labour.

Smart viewers quickly fled to Twitter to reveal their thought's' on Ellis' perfectly timed accident.

Up until now, Emmerdale has only revealed that Ellis will be written out in a matter of weeks, while details on his exit have not been confirmed.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

After tonight's episode and Ellis' blood-covered injury, fans are convinced the character will catch sepsis or blood poisoning in a bid to 'kill him off' the show.

One user questioned: "Wonder if Ellis dies due to that nail? That's how he leaves?"

Another viewer shared: "Don't tell me, Ellis will contract septicaemia or sepsis ."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

While another predicted Ellis' future, posting: "Oh! is this leading to a sepsis storyline?"

Viewers watched as Ellis' brother Billy told the character he was worried about him and his injury as he said: "you're caked in blood.

"You're going to need tetanus".

To which Ellis brushed off and said he was "fine".

Fans continued to speculate Ellis' coming fate as they suspected the rusty nail cut could be the beginning of the end for the character.

(Image: ITV)

One fan pondered: "Will Ellis get blood poisoning?"

While another hoped for the tragic plot, writing: "Please let that be how Ellis goes, killed by a nail."

Actor Asan was axed from the role by bosses in September. He is currently at the centre of a storyline involving the return of his father Al Chapman, played by actor Michael Wildman.

(Image: ITV)

While the actor's final scenes are unknown, they are expected to air soon given the five to six-week gap between filming and transmission.

The actor was caught up in a brawl with Hollyoaks actor Jamie Lomas in an explosive video.

Asan threatened to stab the fellow soap star as the dramatic showdown unfolded.

(Image: ITV)

An ITV spokesman told Mirror Online at the time: "Emmerdale suspended Asan N'Jie yesterday pending further investigation into an incident at a central London hotel on Monday night.

"ITV executives have met with him this morning and as a consequence Asan's contract has been terminated with immediate effect."
description: Viewers speculated that Ellis' deep wound could be the beginning of the character's final scenes
